backend/main.mo: Defines the main actor with authorization mixin, domain types, and ID counters for clinics, patients, treatments, cases, and feedback.
backend/migration.mo: Contains type definitions and migration structures for upgrading stored actor state, including removal of the validatedUsers field.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature evidence entries mapping features to affected frontend files, components, tests, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the behavior and purpose of major frontend files including pages, hooks, utilities, and components.
frontend/index.css: Defines global Tailwind layers and OKLCH color variables for light and dark themes, applying them to base elements.
frontend/index.html: Minimal HTML template that mounts the React app and loads main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up routing and application bootstrap with actor initialization, timeout recovery, and direct rendering of the AppShell without auth gating.
frontend/src/components/auth/AccessCodeG: Empty file placeholder for the removed access-code gate component.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Empty file placeholder for the removed profile setup modal.
frontend/src/components/bootstrap/Bootst: Error recovery UI showing an error message, optional technical details, and actions to retry, reset session, or reload.
frontend/src/components/bootstrap/Router: Wraps routes with an error boundary that clears caches and displays the BootstrapRecoveryScreen on failure.
frontend/src/components/branding/AppLogo: Renders the app logo image in square or wide variants.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/RightS: Sidebar showing follow-up reminders, hygiene due patients, and related patient/treatment info.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/Treatm: Modal forms for adding or editing treatments with validation and backend mutation hooks.
Provides quick actions for treatments including status updates, scheduling follow‑ups, and progress updates.
frontend/src/components/shell/AppShell.t: Main layout with sidebar, mobile navigation, and routed content area.
frontend/src/components/shell/MobileHead: Mobile header with menu toggle and compact logo display.
frontend/src/components/shell/Sidebar.ts: Sidebar navigation with menu items, app branding, and a session reset action.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor based on Internet Identity, refetching dependent queries when the identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useBootstrapTimeout.t: Provides a timeout state when loading exceeds a specified duration to prevent indefinite spinners.
frontend/src/hooks/useHygieneDuePatients: Computes patients overdue for hygiene visits by comparing last cleaning dates with a six‑month threshold.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements Internet Identity auth context, handling login, stored identity loading, and status management.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for CRUD operations on clinics, patients, treatments, cases, feedback, and analytics using the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup with custom CSS variables for themes, colors, and layout tokens.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider, then renders App.
frontend/src/pages/AlignerTrackingPage.t: UI page for managing aligner cases including listing, filtering, progress display, and CRUD modal interactions.
frontend/src/pages/DashboardPage.tsx: Dashboard displaying patients and treatments with filtering, KPIs, pagination, and modals for managing treatment actions.
frontend/src/pages/ImplantTrackingPage.t: Tracks implant cases with stage filtering, search, and CRUD modals for adding, editing, and deleting implant records.
frontend/src/pages/PatientFeedbackPage.t: Manages patient feedback with rating filters, search, stats, and modals for adding or editing feedback entries.
frontend/src/pages/PatientsPage.tsx: Handles patient list, hygiene-due filtering, search, and full CRUD operations with validation and WhatsApp links.
frontend/src/pages/SettingsPage.tsx: Provides settings for managing clinics plus templates for WhatsApp and review links, with modal-based clinic CRUD.
frontend/src/pages/ZonalAnalyticsPage.ts: Displays zonal analytics by aggregating clinics, patients, and treatments and visualizing stats like monthly trends, status distribution, and top doctors.
frontend/src/utils/actorError.ts: Maps backend and bootstrap errors to readable messages and extracts technical details for debugging.
frontend/src/utils/analytics.ts: Provides utilities for grouping treatments, formatting dates, calculating distributions, ranking doctors, and computing remaining work.
frontend/src/utils/bootstrapReset.ts: Clears React Query caches and session keys to fully reset bootstrap state.
Analyzes errors to detect misconfigured or unreachable backend canisters and returns user-friendly diagnostics.
frontend/src/utils/treatmentProgress.ts: Handles tooth number parsing, formatting, and treatment progress calculations and validation.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Manages URL and sessionStorage parameters, including parsing, persistence, and cleanup.
frontend/src/utils/validation.ts: Implements basic validation helpers for email and required fields.
frontend/src/utils/whatsapp.ts: Generates WhatsApp message links from phone numbers and optional text.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration enabling dark mode, custom OKLCH color system, extended theme settings, and animation keyframes with typography, container queries, and animate plugins.
project_state.json: Project state describing the removal of all authentication and access-code gating, listing related features, known issues, and pending requests for fully anonymous app access.
